author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently cook the onion and garlic for 3-4 minutes or until softened. Add the bacon and cook for a further three minutes. Pour over the chicken or vegetable stock and add the tomatoes and purée.  Cook for five minutes. With a hand blender, blend the soup until it's smooth. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 tsp olive oil,  ½ onion, chopped,  2 garlic cloves, chopped,  4 slices bacon, chopped,  ½ pint chicken or vegetable stock,  2 tomatoes, chopped,  2 tbsp tomato purée
